summary: Make use of firewood; craft it into bows and arrows!
descriptionHtml:
This mod allows the player to craft arrows. Lower level arrows require a new item: Chicken Feathers. Higher level arrows use Hawk Feathers. To craft arrows you must have the respective perk (i.e. Steel Arrows req. Steel Smithing perk, Elven Arrows req. Elven Smithing perk etc.) Using firewood, feathers and ingots the player can make arrows.
This mod also adds Elven Gilded Arrows. These new arrows are more powerful than standard Elven Arrows, however they require a quicksilver ingot to craft, too.

Craftable Items:
Long Bow: 2 Firewood - No perks
Hunting Bow: 3 Firewood - No perks
Iron Arrow(12): 1 Iron Ingot, 3 Chicken Feather, 1 Firewood - No perks
Steel Arrow(12): 1 Steel Ingot, 3 Chicken Feather, 1 Firewood - Steel Smithing Perk
Orcish Arrow(12): 1 Orichalcum Ingot, 1 Iron Ingot, 3 Chicken Feather, 1 Firewood - Orcish Smithing Perk
Dwarven Arrow(12): 1 Dwarven Ingot, 1 Hawk Feathers, 1 Firewood - Dwarven Smithing Perk
Elven Arrow(12): 1 Refined Moonstone, 1 Hawk Feathers, 1 Firewood - Elven Smithing Perk
Gilded Elven Arrow(12): 1 Refined Moonstone, 1 Quicksilver Ingot, 1 Hawk Feathers, 1 Firewood - Elven Smithing Perk
Glass Arrow(12): 1 Malachite Ingot, 1 Refined Moonstone, 1 Hawk Feathers, 1 Firewood - Glass Smithing Perk
Ebony Arrow(12): 1 Ebony Ingot, 1 Hawk Feathers, 1 Firewood - Ebony Smithing Perk
Daedric Arrow(12): 12 Ebony Arrow, 1 Daedra Heart - Daedric Smithing Perk

As Hawk Feathers are quite hard to find I have also made them slightly more common than before.
Chicken Feathers can be found on chickens or sometimes in loot.
author: Oblivious12123
